nodes.description: 2019年7月22日，索马里摩加迪沙阿登阿德国际机场附近发生卡车炸弹袭击，造成至少18人死亡，Al-Shabaab宣称对此负责
nodes.support_text: On 22 July 2019, at least 18 people were killed after a car bomb exploded on the road of Aden Adde International Airport and near the Afrin Hotel in Mogadishu, Somalia. Dozens others were injured, 17 critically. Al-Shabaab claimed responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 同日同一道路的检查点发生第二次爆炸，导致17人死亡、28人受伤，包括多名重伤者
nodes.support_text: On 22 July 2019, a vehicle laden with explosives detonated at a checkpoint on the same road as the city's airport killing 17 and injuring 28 others including some who were in critical condition. Witnessed stated that the explosion knocked them off their feet and damaged many buildings.

nodes.description: 2019年7月24日，Al-Shabaab发动第三次袭击，摩加迪沙市长遇袭身亡，6人受伤
nodes.support_text: This attack and the attack two days later that killed the Mayor of Mogadishu and six others shocked and were strongly condemned by many countries.
Witnessed stated that the explosion knocked them off their feet and damaged many buildings.
the explosion knocked them off their feet

nodes.description: 多国强烈谴责这两个袭击
nodes.support_text: 多国强烈谴责这两个袭击

edges.support_text: This attack and the attack two days later that killed the Mayor of Mogadishu and six others shocked and were strongly condemned by many countries.
This attack and the attack two days later that killed the Mayor of Mogadishu and six others shocked and were strongly condemned by many countries.
这两个袭击震惊了多国，多国强烈谴责这两个袭击
